about_the_game:
Escape the neon-drenched chaos in Psyko, a brutal cyberpunk roguelike!
After waking up to a bounty on your head, you're thrust into the unforgiving sprawl of a cybernetic city. Every shadow holds a hunter, every corner whispers secrets. You don't know why you're targeted, but survival is your only option.

Unleash Your Arsenal: Craft and customize your weapons, transforming them into instruments of destruction. Find and equip brutal upgrades in the form of cybernetics, tailoring your playstyle to unleash a symphony of carnage.

Embrace the Grind: Death is inevitable, but it's just the beginning. Each playthrough throws you back into the fray, a little stronger, a little more prepared. Permanent upgrades and unlockables empower you to push further, inching closer to the truth.

Defeat Bosses: Your path is riddled with formidable bounty hunters, each one a twisted reflection of the city's corruption. Master their patterns, exploit their weaknesses, and emerge victorious – or face a brutal reset.

Unravel the Conspiracy: As you carve a bloody path through the city, fragments of the truth begin to surface. Unmask your enemies, uncover the motivations behind your bounty, and fight to reclaim your freedom in this unforgiving cybernetic nightmare.

name: PSYKO
short_description: Naked and on the run, you'll carve a bloody path through a relentless cyberpunk city to escape your pursuers. Can you fight your way free in this unforgiving roguelike?
